Posts.EditableText:
You can do a google search for it. I found a site that talks about causes of that error, but the forum won't let me post the link for some reason.

From there, a general statement: "Most of the time, a 503 error occurs because the server is too busy or because there's maintenance being performed on it." But there are other more specific things that can cause it.

Posts.EditableText: Is the forum hosted on Cloudflare? When I looked them up, it suggested the do all sorts of internet stuff, so it could be they provide DNS servers or some HTTP requests go via their servers.

Posts.EditableText: Looks like things are back to normal now. There were a lot of database time-outs over the last couple of days. That can happen if the site is under heavy load. It looks like archive.org has been backing up the site https://archive.org/download/archiveteam_archivebot_go_20170107040002. Ironic that it caused outages!
